rule: The part of speech tag should be one of the tags listed in the task: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB.
input: sentence: They quickly finished the project., word: quickly
complianceText:
The output includes "CC:" which is the tag for Coordinating conjunction. However, it also includes the word "quickly". According to the description, the output should only include the part of speech tag, not the word itself.
